title: Skins not working...
body: For several games in a row now, my skins have not been showing up. I've tried un-selecting and re-selecting them, and it hasn't done anything. I've noticed this happen quite a bit for me and a few of my friends, and it's really annoying. I spent my money on the skins and I'd like to use them...

replies.body:
Hey Nariil, 

Are you using skins or chromas? Which queues are you trying to enter (Team Builder, SR draft, etc)?

Skins. I can't really pinpoint a pattern in it or anything, but when I had this problem all the time at the beginning of the year I got in the habit of always making sure it was selected, and usually un-selecting and re-selecting, but that doesn't seem to be 100% working now. (It's possible I'm just un-selecting and forgetting to re-select, but I do know for a fact it's happened once in the last couple days when I didn't even un-select, when trying to use Forecast Janna, which I use constantly.) EDIT: And it's always been team builder on SR.
Ah, okay. Team Builder is finicky when it comes to selecting skins. D: Let me ask around and see if I can grab any more information.
Alright. Thank you so much for responding! Aaaand it just happened again, in an ARAM, on Nautilus this time. So I guess it's not just SR for me.
